*** Settings ***
Force Tags    force1    force2
Suite Teardown    Pass Execution    message    -force1

*** Test Cases ***

With suite teardown should not modify tags
    [Documentation]   FAIL Teardown of the parent suite failed:\n'Set Tags' and 'Remove Tags' keywords cannot be used in suite teardown.
    No Operation

Should only pass successful suite teardown if test case fails
    [Documentation]    FAIL test case should fail regardless
    ...
    ...                Also teardown of the parent suite failed:
    ...                'Set Tags' and 'Remove Tags' keywords cannot be used in suite teardown.
    Fail    test case should fail regardless
